allow: Bash(# Check results from all 4 executors for agent_id in f30aa857-7734-43ee-9039-106735481006 86c30166-c00e-4f4c-ba83-c903a7d1c384 dc50cdc2-d926-4011-add0-9de98895e6d5 9d86b7f7-c39a-4b20-999b-b4d72af8a9dd; do echo ""=== Agent $agent_id ==="" sqlite3 ~/.local/share/athena/athena.db ""SELECT substr\(payload, 1, 300\) FROM agent_events WHERE agent_id = ''$agent_id'' AND event_type = ''result'';"")
